item.description:
This event not only benefits a great cause "St Patrick's Day Parade" Local Sponsors of this event bring International wine tasting local - Our very own New Haven chefs cook up some tasty morsels and to top it off the Master of Ceremonies is non other the Vinnie Penn of 960 Weli who is well known for his comedian talents. The wine tasting last from 6:30 to 9:00 on Thursday.

Order your tickets on line for $45.00 at http://stpatricksdayp... or they are $50.00 at the door

RSVP to this Meetup:
http://www.meetup.com...

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Greater New Haven Wine Tasting" To Benefit The St Patrick's Day Parade
